translations: 抒情的，热情奔放的；（与）流行歌曲歌词（有关）的；音乐般的，有音乐特征的

sentences.sentence: This juxtaposition of brutal reality and lyrical beauty runs through Park's stories.
sentences.translation: 残酷的现实和抒情诗般的美并存贯穿于帕克的故事之中。

sentences.sentence: For all the uproar over "Breaking News," I thought it was a pretty bold statement out of the gate in terms of lyrical target.
sentences.translation: 对于《爆炸新闻》引起的所有轩然大波，我认为，就抒情目标而言，这是一个相当大胆的声明。

sentences.sentence: MA'MOUN EL-SHINNAWY, 80, was the master of the modern Arabic lyrical poetry who also wrote the words to more than 1,000 popular Egyptian songs.
sentences.translation: 80岁的马穆恩·埃尔-希纳维是现代阿拉伯抒情诗歌的大师，他还为1000多首埃及流行歌曲写过歌词。
